Text:
Sorry for the slow upload speeds everybody, try to bear with me.

It's going to be slow generally, but at the moment I have to get my ratio up on Sixcrates' (http://thepiratebay.org/user/sixcrates/) FLAC Be Good Tanyas albums, which are well worth checking out if you like this compilation.

As soon as this torrent has stabilised, I'll be uploading Another Country volume two. :) Take it easy all.

Here you are - 'Hello love' in flac :)

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5040343
Yeah, and don't worry yourself with uploading my stuff - I have plenty of bandwidth and never turn off my computer.
